title: [Large-scale] Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Retention and Recall of Clinical Anatomy Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy and clinical medicine knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for professionals over 40, utilizing mobile devices and laboratory sessions

learning_goals: Learners can identify key anatomical structures with 90% accuracy through clinical case-based e-modules
Learners can perform clinical skills with 80% accuracy based on anatomical knowledge in hands-on laboratory sessions
Learners achieve a 15% or higher score improvement in pre-post assessments for self-learned anatomical knowledge domains
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
